main.name: Waldir Miron
main.bio1:
My name is Waldir M. Berbel-Filho and thanks for visiting my website. I have a broad interest in evolutionary biology, being particularly fascinated by the evolutionary processes driving biodiversity diversification.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM, Tatarenkov A, Pacheco G, Espírito-Santo HMV, Lira MG, de Leaniz CG, Avise JC, Lima SMQ, Rodríguez-López C, Consuegra S. 2021.
publications.title: Against the odds: hybrid zones between mangrove killifish species with different mating systems.

publications.authors: Lira MG*, Berbel-Filho WM*, Espírito-Santo HMV, Tatarenkov A, Avise JC, de Leaniz CG, Consuegra S, Lima SMQ. 2021.
publications.title: Filling the gaps: phylogeography of the self-fertilizing Kryptolebias species (Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae) along South American mangroves.

publications.authors: Lima SMQ, Berbel-Filho WM, Vilasboas A, Lazoski C, Volpi TA, Lazzaroto H, Russo CAM, Tatarenkov A, Avise JC, Solé-Cava A. 2021
publications.title: Rio de Janeiro and other palaeodrainages evidenced by the genetic structure of an Atlantic Forest catfish.

publications.authors: Preprint: Berbel-Filho WM, Tatarenkov A, Pacheco G, Espírito-Santo HMV, Lira MG, de Leaniz CG, Avise JC, Lima SMQ, Rodríguez-López C, Consuegra S.
publications.title: Additive and non-additive epigenetic signatures of hybridisation between fish species with different mating systems.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM, Tatarenkov A, Espírito-Santo HMV, Lira MG, de Leaniz CG, Lima SMQ, Consuegra S.
publications.title: More than meets the eye: syntopic and morphologically similar mangrove killifish species show different mating systems and patterns of genetic structure along the Brazilian coast.
publications.paper:
Heredity 125:340-352.

Featured in Heredity's podcast | NatureEcoEvoCommunity blog | Preprint version at BioRkiv.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM, Berry N, Rodríguez-Barreto D, Teixeira SR, de Leaniz CG, Consuegra S. 2020.
publications.title: Environmental enrichment induces intergenerational behavioural and epigenetic efffecs on fish.

publications.authors: Godeiro NN, Pacheco G, Liu S, Cipola NG, Berbel-Filho WM, Zang F, Gilbert MTP, Bellini BC.  2020.
publications.title: Phylogeny of Neotropical Seirinae (Collembola, Entomobryidae) based on mitochondrial genomes.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM. 2020.
publications.title: The relative roles of genetic and epigenetic variation on the ecology and evolution of mangrove killifishes (Kryptolebias spp.).
publications.paper: PhD thesis on Biological sciences, Swansea University, Swansea, United Kingdom.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM, de Leaniz CG, Morán P, Cable J, Lima SMQ, Consuegra S. 2019.
publications.title: Local parasite pressures and host genotype modulate epigenetic diversity in a mixed-mating fish.
publications.paper:
Ecology and Evolution 9: 8736-8749.

Preprint version at BioRkiv.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM, Rodríguez-Barreto D, Berry N, de Leaniz CG, Consuegra S. 2019.
publications.title: Contrasting DNA methylation responses of inbred fish lines to different rearing environments.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM, Ramos TPA, Jacobina UP, Maia DJG, Torres RA, Lima SMQ. 2018.
publications.title: Updated checklist and DNA barcode-based species delimitations reveal taxonomic uncertainties among freshwater fishes from the Mid-north-eastern Caatinga ecoregion, north-eastern Brazil.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM,  Barros-Neto LF, Dias RM, Mendes LF, Figueiredo CAA, Torres RA, Lima SMQ. 2018.
publications.title: Poecilia vivipara Bloch and Schneider 1801 (Cyprinodontiformes, Poeciliidae), a guppy in an oceanic archipelago: from where did it come?
publications.paper:
ZooKeys 746:91-104.

Link to EurekAlert! Link to National Geographic news

publications.authors: Barton H, Berbel-Filho WM, Consuegra S, Francis L, Tizaoui C, Conlan RS, Teixeira SR. 2018.
publications.title: Ultrasensitive environmental assessment of xeno-estrogens in water samples using label-free graphene immunosensors.

publications.authors: Lima SMQ, Berbel-Filho WM, Araújo TFP, Lazzarotto H, Tatarenkov A, Avise JC. 2017.
publications.title: Headwater capture evidenced by paleo-rivers reconstruction and population genetic structure of the armored catfish (Pareiorhaphis garbei) in the Serra do Mar mountains of southeastern Brazil.

publications.authors: Tatarenkov A, Lima SMQ, Earley RL, Berbel-Filho WM, Vermeulen FBM, Taylor DS, Marson K et al. 2017.
publications.title: Deep and concordant subdivisions in the self-fertilizing mangrove killifishes (Kryptolebias) revealed by nuclear and mtDNA markers.
publications.paper: Biological Journal of the Linnean Society 122:558-578.

publications.authors: Lima FD, Berbel-Filho WM, Leite TS, Rosas C, Lima SMQ. 2017.
publications.title: Occurrence of Octopus insularis Leite and Haimovici, 2008 in the Tropical Northwestern Atlantic and implications of species misidentification to octopus fisheries management.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho, Espírito-Santo HMV, Lima SMQ. 2016.
publications.title: First record of a male of Kryptolebias hermaphroditus Costa, 2011 (Cyprinodontiformes: Cynolebiidae).

publications.authors: Lima SMQ, Vasconcellos AV, Berbel-Filho WM, Lazoski C, Russo CAM, Sazima I, Solé-Cava AM. 2016.
publications.title: Effects of Pleistocene climatic and geomorphological changes on the population structure of the restricted-range catfish Trichogenes longipinnis (Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae).

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM, Martinez PA, Ramos TPA, Torres RA, Lima SMQ. 2016.
publications.title: Inter- and intra-basin phenotypic variation in two riverine cichlids from northeastern Brazil: potential eco-evolutionary damages of São Francisco interbasin water transfer.

publications.authors: Molina WF, Pacheco GA, Berbel-Filho WM. 2014.
publications.title: Padrões citogenéticos de duas espécies de ciclídeos de bacias do semi-árido do brasil: Crenicichla menezesi e Cichlasoma orientale.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM. 2014.
publications.title: Sistemática integrativa de Cichlasoma orientale Kullander 1983 e Crenicihla menezesi Ploeg 1991 (Teleostei: Cichlidae) das bacias hidrográficas do Nordeste do Brasil.
publications.paper: Msc Thesis on Systematics and Evolution Program, Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil.

publications.authors: Brito MFG, Lima SMQ, Berbel-Filho WM, Torres RA. 2014.
publications.title: New records and distribution extension of Hyphessobrycon itaparicensis Lima & Costa, 2001 (Characiformes: Characidae) in coastal drainages of Sergipe state, northeastern Brazil.

publications.authors: Berbel-Filho WM, Jacobina UP, Martinez PA. 2013.
publications.title: Preservation effects in geometric morphometric approaches: freezing and alcohol in a freshwater fish.

publications.authors: Martinez PA, Berbel-Filho WM, Jacobina UP. 2013.
publications.title: Is formalin fixation and ethanol preservation able to influence in geometric morphometric analysis? Fishes as a case study.
